question: Identify the trends and focus areas in technology for companies within the healthcare industry over the last three years.

subtasks.task: Query the CompanyInfo table to find all companies operating in the healthcare industry, filtering by the FoundedYear to include only those founded before 2021.
Extract and analyze data from the CompanyFocusAreaDetail table to determine the strategic technology focus areas of the identified healthcare companies over the last three years.
Compile insights from the IndustryITTrend table to highlight emerging IT trends relevant to the healthcare industry from the last three years.

Correlate findings from the CompanyDealMaster table to examine any significant technology service contracts or vendor relationships established by these healthcare companies during the same timeframe.
Summarize the results into a comprehensive report indicating the technology trends and focus areas identified in the healthcare sector based on the compiled data.
